recipesJson.name: ANGER
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
A cinnamon honey Greek Yogurt.

Rich Cinnamon is 1 drop per 30ml of e-liquid.

Sweeten to taste.

reviews.text: Really nice Vape. 3 month steep it made it to back of the cabinet and found it. I. did not use any sweeter it really did not need it. Thanks
